metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the win-def:group_test is properly supported.
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the win-def:group_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.
Information regarding the groups on your particular machine can be found by navigating to Start->Run... and by typing 'mmc' and adding the local users and groups snap-in.

criterion.comment: Test that a group_object is supported.
Test that a group_object with a pattern match is supported
Test that a group_object not equals is supported

group_test.comment: Test that a group_object is supported.
Test that a group_object with a pattern match is supported
Test that a group_object not equals is supported

group_object.comment: Retrieves a group_object that matches the 'Administrators' group.
Retrieves a group_object that matches the regular expression 'Admin.*'
Retrieves a group_object that is not equal to 'Administrators' group.

group_state.comment: This state represents a group_object state that matches the 'ADMINSTRATORS' group.
This state represents a group_oject state that matches the expression 'Admin.*'.
This state represents a group_object state that is not equal to 'Administrators' group.
